preprocessing-info:
Steps:
  remove_punctuation
  lemmatization
  remove_stopwords
  filter_words
  remove_docs
Parameters:
  removed words with less than 0.0005 or more than 1 documents with an occurrence of the word in corpus
  removed documents with less than 3 words
